bug_report.summary: The Edit button doesn't work for the product on the cart page
bug_report.steps_to_reproduce: 1. Log in as valid user, 2. Add product to the cart, 3. Open cart, 4. Click on the Edit button near the product
bug_report.expected_behavior: Configurator for the product is opened
bug_report.observed_behavior: Configurator for the product is NOT opened
